## Choose a template

Click one of these to prefill:
- Feature → `?template=feature.md`
- Bugfix → `?template=bugfix.md`
- Refactor → `?template=refactor.md`
- Docs → `?template=docs.md`
- CI/CD → `?template=ci-cd.md`
- Maintenance → `?template=maintenance.md`
- General → `?template=general.md`

> Tip: The links in `CONTRIBUTING.md` already open the correct template.
